import {useEffect ,useState} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import "../App.css" import {createUserWithEmailAndPassword , onAuthStateChanged} from "firebase/auth" import {auth} from "../firebase" function Nav() { const [user,setUser]=useState("") useEffect(() => { onAuthStateChanged(auth, (currentUser) => { setUser(currentUser); }); }, []) return (

    • {user.email}
) } export default Nav
